event.title: was incorporated by the Nebraska Territorial Legislature on March 10, 1857

data.event: It was incorporated by the Nebraska Territorial Legislature on March 10, 1857.

event.title: was established at the site of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints 1846

data.event: Cutler's Park was established at the site of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints 1846 Winter Quarters as a hold-over on their way from Nauvoo, Illinois to Utah.

event.title: are buried in what is now

data.event: Due to the harsh conditions, 359 members of the 2,500 person party died and are buried in what is now called the Mormon Pioneer Cemetery.
The Mormon pioneers left their town once they moved on in 1848.
Mitchell platted Florence six years later.
